menu.name: Vegan Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with vegan Caesar dressing and croutons.

menu.description: Thin-crust pizza with vegan mozzarella, tomato sauce, and fresh basil.

menu.name: Vegan Sushi Platter
menu.description: Assorted vegan sushi rolls with pickled ginger and wasabi.

menu.name: Vegan Penne Alfredo
menu.description: Penne pasta with creamy vegan Alfredo sauce and roasted garlic.

menu.name: Vegan Chocolate Cake
menu.description: Decadent chocolate cake with vegan chocolate ganache.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Toasted baguette topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

menu.name: Calamari Rings
menu.description: Crispy fried calamari rings with marinara sauce.

menu.name: Mozzarella Sticks
menu.description: Crispy fried mozzarella sticks with a side of marinara sauce.

menu.name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
menu.description: Creamy dip with spinach, artichokes, and tortilla chips.

menu.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
menu.description: Mushroom caps stuffed with garlic, cheese, and herbs.

menu.name: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Grilled salmon fillet with lemon butter sauce, served with steamed vegetables and rice.

menu.name: Ribeye Steak
menu.description: A juicy ribeye steak cooked to perfection, served with mashed potatoes and gravy.

menu.name: Chicken Alfredo
menu.description: Fettuccine pasta with grilled chicken and creamy Alfredo sauce.

menu.name: Veggie Stir-Fry
menu.description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce served over rice.

menu.name: Pork Tenderloin
menu.description: Roasted pork tenderloin with apple compote and mashed sweet potatoes.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

menu.name: Key Lime Pie
menu.description: Tangy key lime pie with a graham cracker crust and whipped cream.

menu.description: Creamy and rich cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.
